metadata.title: CVE-2023-4522 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before16.2.0. Committing directories containing LF character results in 500errors when viewing the commit.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
